location: Ukrainian Cultural Centre, 3277 Douglas St., Victoria, BC
description: Get ready to celebrate the longest day of the year with a night full of Latin rhythms, summer vibes, and nonstop dancing! Salsa | Bachata | Merengue | Latin Beats – all night long! Dress Code: Wear sunset colors – orange, yellow, and red! No partner? No problem! Join our fun intro class at 8:00 PM! Intro Class: 8:00 PM | Social Dance: 8:30 PM - Late Entry: $15 at the door – Bring cash, please! What to Expect: A high-energy Latin dance party Tropical summer decorations & festival vibes A fun and welcoming dance community Come celebrate the official start of summer with us! Let’s dance into the sunset and bring the heat to the dance floor!
